title: The Broadcast That Changed Everything: Night of the living dead

sources.title: The Broadcast That Changed Everything: Night of the living dead
sources.description:
"The Broadcast That Changed Everything: Night of the Living Dead" takes you back to a pivotal moment in cinema history. This classic movie, a staple among old films and part of our public domain collection, redefined the horror genre with its chilling tale of chaos and survival. As panic sweeps the nation, radio stations unite to keep citizens informed of the unprecedented epidemic of mass murder. The film explores the terror and confusion as the dead rise, feasting on the living, while frightened survivors seek refuge. Dive into the historical significance of this groundbreaking film that continues to captivate audiences with its raw and gripping narrative. To stay informed about more classic movies like this, subscribe to our newsletter.

#Apocalypse #ZombieVirus #ZombieApocalypse #ZombieAttack #WorldNews

#CurrentEvents #GunViolence #Zombie #TheWalkingDead #ZombieAttack

CHAPTERS:
00:00 - Radio reports of mass murder
38:20 - Civil defense reports of mass murder victims
44:40 - Decision: Stay upstairs or go to the cellar
55:32 - Civil defense rescue stations
57:49 - Venus probe explosion and radiation
59:25 - Judy and Tom
1:00:06 - Press conference
1:00:43 - The dead are coming back to life
